attributes.action: Block fraudulent ticket reselling companies outside of the uk
attributes.background: Like many other people in the uk I bought tickets from a company called ticketselection, a company based in Spain. I paid four times the ticket price. This company never sent tickets, never refunds people and never responds to phone calls and emails. This site and others like it needs to get blocked

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
